scripts.deps: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.infra.yml pull && cd frontend && pnpm install
scripts.db:del: bun db:down && (docker volume rm researchcruiseapp_researchcruiseapp-db || true) && rm admin.log || true
scripts.admin:pass:
bun db:del && sleep 5 && bun db:up && sleep 5 && temp=$(mktemp) && timeout -s KILL 20 bun dot:start | tee $temp; grep -i admin $temp > admin.log && rm $temp && echo '
Admin password info saved to root/admin.log'
